Welcome to prob140’s documentation!¶

Release:0.3.0.0
Date:Nov 25, 2017

The prob140 package was written by Jason Zhang and Dibya Ghosh for use in Berkeley’s Prob140 course.

Special thanks to Riccardo Scalco for his Pykov module

Also take a look at Data8’s datascience documentation
